props.extensionHeight: Designate an explicit height for the `extension` slot.
props.prominent: Increases the height of the component content to the value of the **prominentHeight** prop.
props.prominentHeight: Designate an explicit height when using the **prominent** prop.
props.collapse: Morphs the component into a collapsed state, reducing its maximum width.
props.scrollBehavior: Specify an action to take when the scroll position of **scroll-target** reaches **scroll-threshold**. Accepts any combination of hide, inverted, collapse, elevate, and fade-image. Multiple values can be used, separated by a space.
props.scrollTarget: The element to target for scrolling events. Uses `window` by default.
props.scrollThreshold: The amount of scroll distance down before **scroll-behavior** activates.
props.location: Aligns the component towards the top or bottom.

slots.extension: Slot positioned directly under the main content of the toolbar. Height of this slot can be set explicitly with the **extension-height** prop.
